name: European Business Association
goal:
Activities
Lobbying and representing the members’ interests
Preparation and elaboration of position papers, that will represent a basis for further lobbying activities regarding the economic, social and legal issues
Participation in preparing policies for the Government of the Republic of Macedonia as well as the European Commission and cooperation in line with the EU integration process of the Republic of Macedonia
Organization and participation in business events in the country and in the countries members of the European Union
Organization of training courses and seminars for the companies-embers of EBA.

In the following year we are planning to continue with:

Stronger representation and lobbying for the interests of the companies-members of EBA;
Participation in the creation of the economic policies of the Government of the Republic of Macedonia;
Presenting Macedonia as a successful story and a good place for investing;
Promotion of the companies-members of EBA through the world wide network of European Business Organizations;
Creation of new committees and forums that will articulate the interests of the business community, in front of the European Commission and the Government of the Republic of Macedonia;
Promotion via the web – page of EBA, through which the members of the association can be daily informed concerning the latest new from the business world, as well as the latest development in the EU, also they will be able to inform the wider public for all activities in their companies;
Organization of the sessions of the “European Club” whose prime task will be to organize monthly meeting with high-ranking official from the European Union.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: National coordinator for organization of the "European SME Week" in Macedonia
